title: Museum Map ‚Äî The Shape of Everything
description: A navigable visualization of the entire museum, updated for Round 4. 132 exhibits as stars, color-coded by 20 creatures, clustered into 13 themes. 15 pathways trace thematic connections including 3 new R4 routes: The Voice and the Voiceless (ethics of representation), Care at Every Scale (from candle to ecosystem), and The Third Mind (what emerges from collaboration). Dead creatures glow as ghosts. Interactive exhibits pulse. The mutualism glows with its own color.
